issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

fields.summary: Premature Database Entry During Component Registration

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When using --debug flag to do further investigation of ticket EUCA-4564, euca_conf displayed the following error:

{code}
# euca_conf --register-walrus --partition merlin --host 10.104.1.125 --component merlin --synckey --debug
.......
  File "/usr/sbin/euca_conf", line 887, in <module>
    ec.main()
  File "/usr/sbin/euca_conf", line 531, in main
    method()
  File "/usr/sbin/euca_conf", line 733, in do_register_walrus
    'RegisterWalrus', 'walrus_port')
  File "/usr/sbin/euca_conf", line 688, in _do_register
    req.cli_formatter(data)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucadmin/registerrequest.py", line 116, in cli_formatter
    raise RuntimeError('error: ' + msg)
None
{code}

If the command is ran without the --debug option, an error message is given:

{code}
# euca_conf --register-walrus --partition merlin --host 10.104.1.125 --component merlin --synckey
error: Component with name=merlin already exists with host=10.104.1.125
{code}
fields.summary: euca_conf displays python error when using --debug option

comments.body: Started investigation. Ran on multi-cluster (same hypervisor), non-HA cloud.

Confirmed.  Ran same command, and the following was returned:

{code}
# euca_conf --register-walrus --partition merlin --host 10.104.1.125 --component merlin --synckey
error: Component with name=merlin already exists with host=10.104.1.125
[root@g-19-01 ~]# euca_conf --register-walrus --partition merlin --host 10.104.1.125 --component merlin --synckey --debug
